Master Answer:
The inactivated influenza (flu) vaccine (flu shot) can be given at the same time or any time before or after the 12 month vaccines. 
Immunization Nurse
Master Question: My son has his one year immunization on nov 7. I would like to get him the flu shot as well. Should we wait a certain number of days between getting his immunization and the shot
Master Question variation 0: how long can i wait to get my son shots after flu shot and immunization
Master Question variation 1: how long do you wait to have child have flu shot before immunization
